featured.text: In 1884, Carl Elsener, head of the Swiss knife manufacturer Victorinox, seized that opportunity with both hands, and designed a soldier’s knife that the army loved.

definition.zh_def: 瑞士品牌，以生產多功能刀具和戶外用品聞名。
definition.en_def: A Swiss brand known for producing multi-functional knives and outdoor equipment.
definition.example: I always carry my Victorinox Swiss Army knife when I go camping.
